description: This file defines a React functional component 'BarChart' that renders a minimal horizontal bar chart. The component accepts data either as an object or an array, sorts and slices it, and renders corresponding visual elements with styled divs and labels.

methods.name: BarChart
methods.description: React functional component that renders a bar chart based on given props.

methods.name: formatNumber
methods.description: Formats a number into a locale-aware string with up to two decimal places.
